name: Fishin' Trip [Minigame]
description:
This is just a minigame I made this last week for fun. There's a ton of glitches I'm sure so feedback is definitely appreciated. 

There are 7 different types of fish (and a bonus fish that only spawns on a hidden tile (hint: it's by the beach :D)! There are different fish probabilities at different parts of the map so be sure to explore around!!

CONTROLS:

Arrow keys/WASD - Move character

Spacebar - Cast rod, reel rod, interact with merchant
